Package com.adidas.connect.ui.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CustomAppBarLayout.ScrollListener  
    CustomAppBarLayout.TouchListener  
    ExpandableScrollView.Listener  
    NewsletterSignUpView.Listener  
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CustomAppBarLayout
    AppBarLayout that allows listening for the scroll and touch events.
    CustomAppBarLayout.Behavior  
    ExpandableScrollView
    ScrollView that has 3 states: collapsed, short height and full height.
    NewsletterSignUpView
    Embeddable view for newsletter sign up.
    PageIndicator
    Simple ViewPager page indicator showing dots.
    RoundedImageView  
    SquareRelativeLayout
    RelativeLayout with Squared ratio
    WrapContentViewPager
    ViewPager that sets its height from the biggest child.
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    ExpandableScrollView.State
